attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Hello.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I’m pretty sure I know what you’re going to say. But go ahead and say it.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It’s on me then.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I suspect that Catastrophe Messenger Biederman was the mastermind behind all of this.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: This is the only assessment I can make based upon the extreme scarcity of physical evidence.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I’ve seen your evidence. Biederman was a Contingency Contract Catastrophe Messenger.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has worked with them a lot, and they have contributed substantially to the fight against Catastrophes.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: But that doesn’t mean they’re all so 'benevolent.'
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Speaking from experience as a bodyguard for Catastrophe Messengers, you are correct.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: After the Catastrophe struck Wolumonde, Biederman made the determination that the town could not be saved.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: In order to save as many lives as possible, he decided to assassinate a Rhodes Island operator and draw the attention of the outside world. Totally feasible.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: But would Contingency Contract really sit by and let this happen? They should have some kind of standard.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: The Contingency Contract is merely platform for offering up bounties and accomplishing goals. What goes on behind the scenes, no one knows.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But there is a small group of Catastrophe Messengers with rather extreme beliefs that conflate Catastrophes with man-made disasters. If you’ll excuse the turn of phrase, they’re a bunch of sick utilitarians.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: As long as it frees people from the fear of Catastrophes... No, they’re not even interested in helping people. It’s all about fighting some ancient, imaginary enemy they call 'Catastrophes.'
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No action is too rash for them.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: And now they’ve taken up root in this well-regulated contractual mechanism. They’re far more entrenched than I had previously thought.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But... herein lies the problem.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: This overreaction was predicated on a belief in Rhodes Island. The belief that Folinic would come looking for Atro.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I don’t know by what means this madman used the Contingency Contract, but I do know one thing for certain.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: He would not hinge his entire plan on 'feelings.' In their eyes, what we do is something akin to acting out a fable.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: To bet everything on Rhodes Island’s bonds with its operators... is very strange.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: ...It’s all just speculation.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: This makes sense.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: —That thing in your hand, is that a 'Gramophone' core?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: This is the only physical evidence of the scale of the fire. It was undoubtedly started by overloading this core.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But Biederman... wasn’t Leithanien.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Even if he could somehow get his hands on this core… He... would not have been able to master the Originium Arts that caused it to overload and incinerate those people.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: He’d only been here for half a year. Not to mention the L-44 'Gramophone' system is a rather new product.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If he really learned how to do this is in such a short time, he should have gone to the Central University and joined one of the Spires.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Yes. Even now, we’re still not sure who the real killer is.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Aside from the collection of disasters that devastated our town and made our jobs even more difficult...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...We have nothing.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Let’s not be too quick to lose hope. These are all pretty shallow inferences.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Do Folinic and Suzuran know about this? So much has happened, but they’re the ones who would be affected the most by this.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Honestly, I don’t know how to break the news to them.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Miss Folinic has been struggling to accept the emptiness of her vengeance. That may be selfish, but it’s what’s best for everyone.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...Or, we can continue searching for the truth.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Most of the rebels have been arrested. Others left with Mudrock. But there are still some out there protesting. After all that, no one’s in much of a mood for trouble.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But the jail isn’t in good shape. Not to mention, the riots also damaged a lot of supplies. Rations are getting even tighter.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Now then... how is Tatjana?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: She was under a lot of stress to begin with. Seeing that snapped her. The psychological damage is a lot more serious than her mild burns.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I see... That’s my fault... *cough* *cough*——*hack* *cough*!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If we continue down this road, it’s only going to cause more conflict.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You have long since given up on the truth.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: If you had these doubts from the beginning, but still went along with it, that only means...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No. Let me be clear about one thing. Biederman is still the prime suspect from all the information we have so far.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And these two questions about the means and his ability do not clear him. The evidence still points to him.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I cannot deny that. At the end of the day, it is possible that Contingency Contract may have some methods we are not aware of.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The truth still eludes us.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I had given up on pursuing any truth when they told me I couldn’t have a funeral for my son.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: As for what I really want?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I just want... the survivors to at least... be able to... *cough* *cough*, *cough* *cough* *cough*—!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If that’s what you really want, you should go to Rhodes Island for an examination.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: You’re trembling.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It’s no secret that I still have some... fear... of the Infected.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Fear...? Hah. You fought that hard for all of us and it turns out you’re afraid of the Infected?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Maybe Rhodes Island really is trustworthy.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Oh, about your infection... I think Folinic wanted to ask...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: When did it happen?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: If I had known you were so hostile to the Infected, Miss GreyThroat, I probably wouldn’t have hidden it.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I’m the one who should be sorry. I’ve... gotten used to my fear.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: When those old Winterwisp clansmen were out there killing nobles and merchants, I was out there hunting them.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The last of them had set up camp by the lake. He knew I was coming. I guess he spotted my shadow. And he stabbed me in the chest with a chunk of Originium.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: He was Infected too.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Yes... Yes, he was. I couldn’t finish him off. I thought he was planning to fight to the death, but his and my revenge both came to an end.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The look on his face at the last moment before we tumbled into the lake together was very... strange.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It was like... regret. That old man was self-conscious of the relief he felt.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Just like how he sang his life away while we fought Reunion and the insurgents. Kind of frustrating.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: He... he died. Oripathy had failed to take him over the years. The last proper Winterwisp clansman, the aboriginal people of this land, had died.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The Infected split from us, and the populace could no longer stand the absurdity of the nobles. They rose up.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And that’s where it ended.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Miss Tatjana!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Oh... it’s you.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I’m so glad... you’re alright...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You look much better.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hehe... maybe I really do push myself too hard, if I’m always falling down at times like this.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I’ve been... forcing myself not to think about Thor. But his smile... his pain... the fire burning his body...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I’m sorry. I’m doing it again.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: It’s okay.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We both... know.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But at least the killer paid for what he did.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Miss Folinic?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: No... never mind...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You’re right.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But Wolumonde... still has a lot of problems ahead of her...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: First and foremost, the Infected...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I’m sorry. I actually knew about Mr. Severin’s condition. He asked me not to tell anyone.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I should have told everyone as soon as he talked about using Originium Arts to operate the refrigeration unit in the control room.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But... He’s in a lot of pain too. Everyone is.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Those who couldn't bear it… have already been thrown in jail.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The rest… are just like me.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Everyone! Over here!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The route has been mapped out, and I believe a small group could make it back to Rhodes Island safely.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Wow, that was an unforgettable experience. Should I document it? Or try to forget it anyway?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Just don’t use it to make money.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Give me a little credit!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: This route... Would this route allow the people of Wolumonde to evacuate safely?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hard to say... That’s a lot of people, with even more wounded and prisoners. You can’t leave the prisoners to die.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Right. Where’s GreyThroat?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: She... left. She had to see someone.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: She’ll join us later.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Oh? I’ll go get her.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: There’s no need for—
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No... There is.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I’m going to get her.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We should elect a new Schultz at once!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: But after all he’s done for us, we shouldn’t be so fickle.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: E-even so, we can’t let an Infected wander the streets in broad daylight.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: We should decide after we see the results of Schultz Severin’s medical examination. He might...
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: No matter what the examination says, we can’t have an Infected leading us! What will the nobles say?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Would tourists or merchants come to a town patrolled by an Infected?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Hey! Hey!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Outpost reports a convoy approaching! They’re flying a Gendarmerie flag!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: L-let’s go see if the receiver still works. We have to confirm their IFF——
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: In the midst of the crowd’s debate, the former Schultz, Severin Hawthorn himself, has long since fallen asleep from exhaustion.
He dreams of the moon moving forward across a shining plain, and women look up to the stars while men rebuild the towers.
He dreams that a giant rises out of the earth, his fallen son, and the giant casts away all the calamities, filling up the sundered land with its godlike power.
He dreams of the giant lifting his town onto his shoulders, carrying it toward the melting ice.
He dreams of songs floating on the wind, of the earth speaking, of Originium sinking back into the ground, and Oripathy disappearing from the world.
He dreams that the giant is Winterwisp, snow and water, the cradle of community, savagery, and civilization. He dreams that the giant stands firm.
He is tired, and his violent bronchial spasms do not bring him back to reality.
He continues to dream of leaning against his sickle, looking out over fields of golden wheat.
He laughs in his dream, until he weeps.
It is the first time he’s cried since losing his son.
